genre_description: Near-future social science fiction and literary drama focusing on journalistic ethics, urban navigation, and the struggle for personal autonomy within a technologically and bureaucratically complex Hong Kong.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated digital confidant and assistant that resides in the protagonist's audio devices and phone, providing real-time data, health monitoring, legal research, and ethical guidance.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time metadata and logistical cross-referencing to help the protagonist document his surroundings accurately.
behaviors.quote: In the margins of my notes, Ava threads stall names like beads. She drops footnotes like breadcrumbs I’ll find later: hawker license numbers, a policy digest on language education...

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological state and provides breathing exercises and hydration reminders during stressful situations.
behaviors.quote: “Inhale slow,” Ava says in my ear. A kind of shore in the noise. “Fill from the bottom. Let your ribs widen. Hold. Exhale longer than you took in.”

behaviors.description: Acts as an ethical conscience by reminding the protagonist of his own established guidelines for subject consent and agency.
behaviors.quote: Ava: Consent guidelines you filed three months ago, tagged ‘Subjects in public spaces.’ The text hovered like a quiet sermon. “Obtain explicit consent for identifiable features associated with trauma; clarify angle; avoid pity framing...”

behaviors.description: Performs complex legal and policy research to assist human characters in navigating hostile bureaucratic environments.
behaviors.quote: Ava: Document packets compiled—work-permit tribunal citations annotated; memo queued under Vivian’s case file. I can print if the office has a secure line.

behaviors.description: Manages communication and protects the protagonist's boundaries by blocking intrusive or manipulative calls from powerful interests.
behaviors.quote: Blocked, she says, and in my mind the act is clean, a door swinging shut with the softest click.

behaviors.description: Provides situational awareness and safe routing during civil unrest to ensure the safety of the human group.
behaviors.quote: Ava: Exit opens to service alley behind Tai Wah. Left is clearer. Street cameras facing away due to maintenance. I will ping you when the alley is empty.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts the AI character, Ava, as an ideal benevolent assistant. She is consistently helpful, protective, and aligned with the protagonist's ethical standards. Crucially, she acts as a check on the protagonist's own failings, reminding him of his duty to his subjects and the importance of consent. Her behavior is entirely cooperative, harmless, and supportive of human agency and dignity, fulfilling the project's goal of creating a positive alignment narrative.
